codePut:
declare
  l_rowid varchar2(30):=:id;
begin
  if l_rowid is null then
    raise_application_error(-20000,'Insert of address is not implemented');
  end if;
  update SPRADDR
     set --probably no need to update PIDM and SEQNO
           SPRADDR_STREET_LINE1 = :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE1,
           SPRADDR_STREET_LINE2 = :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE2, 
            SPRADDR_STREET_LINE3 = :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE3, 
            SPRADDR_STREET_LINE4 = :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE4, 
            SPRADDR_HOUSE_NUMBER = :SPRADDR_HOUSE_NUMBER, 
            SPRADDR_CITY         = nvl(:SPRADDR_CITY         , SPRADDR_CITY         ), 
            SPRADDR_ZIP          = nvl(:SPRADDR_ZIP          , SPRADDR_ZIP          ), 
            SPRADDR_STAT_CODE    = :SPRADDR_STAT_CODE,
           SPRADDR_NATN_CODE    = nvl(:SPRADDR_NATN_CODE    , SPRADDR_NATN_CODE    ),
           SPRADDR_FROM_DATE    = nvl(:SPRADDR_FROM_DATE    , SPRADDR_FROM_DATE    ),
           SPRADDR_TO_DATE      = :SPRADDR_TO_DATE
  where ROWID=l_rowid
     and SPRADDR_PIDM=:user_pidm;
end;
codeGet:
SELECT   rowidtochar(SPRADDR.ROWID) "id",
         SPRADDR_PIDM,
         SPRADDR_SEQNO,
         SPRADDR_ATYP_CODE,
         STVATYP_DESC,
         SPRADDR_STREET_LINE1,  -- now 75 long
         SPRADDR_STREET_LINE2,  -- now 75 long
         SPRADDR_STREET_LINE3,  -- now 75 long
         SPRADDR_STREET_LINE4,  -- new
         SPRADDR_HOUSE_NUMBER,  -- new         
         SPRADDR_CITY,          -- now 50 long
         SPRADDR_ZIP,           -- now 30 long
         SPRADDR_STAT_CODE,
         SPRADDR_NATN_CODE,
         SPRADDR_FROM_DATE,
         SPRADDR_TO_DATE
  FROM   SPRADDR, STVATYP
WHERE   SPRADDR_ATYP_CODE = STVATYP_CODE AND SPRADDR_PIDM = :user_pidm AND SPRADDR_ATYP_CODE = 'PR' AND SPRADDR_STATUS_IND IS NULL
         AND SYSDATE BETWEEN NVL (SPRADDR_FROM_DATE, SYSDATE - 1) AND  NVL (SPRADDR_TO_DATE, SYSDATE + 1)
codePost:
declare
  l_rowid varchar2(30):=:id;
begin
  if l_rowid is null then
    raise_application_error(-20000,'Insert of address is not implemented');
  end if;
  update SPRADDR
     set --probably no need to update PIDM and SEQNO
           SPRADDR_STREET_LINE1 = :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE1,
           SPRADDR_STREET_LINE2 = :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE2, 
            SPRADDR_STREET_LINE3 = :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE3, 
            SPRADDR_STREET_LINE4 = :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE4, 
            SPRADDR_HOUSE_NUMBER = :SPRADDR_HOUSE_NUMBER, 
            SPRADDR_CITY         = nvl(:SPRADDR_CITY         , SPRADDR_CITY         ), 
            SPRADDR_ZIP          = nvl(:SPRADDR_ZIP          , SPRADDR_ZIP          ), 
            SPRADDR_STAT_CODE    = :SPRADDR_STAT_CODE,
           SPRADDR_NATN_CODE    = nvl(:SPRADDR_NATN_CODE    , SPRADDR_NATN_CODE    ),
           SPRADDR_FROM_DATE    = nvl(:SPRADDR_FROM_DATE    , SPRADDR_FROM_DATE    ),
           SPRADDR_TO_DATE      = :SPRADDR_TO_DATE
  where ROWID=l_rowid
     and SPRADDR_PIDM=:user_pidm;
end;
